channel.title: [PI] Server to Client error
channel.description:
Hey all, I used to run a 474 server which is based from PI. Now i'm thinking about updating the server so it can load new items, the client is done loading 634 items, 602 anims/gfx's. The client runs perfectly until some of the new items are introduced, then the client crashes.
Can someone help me out? (Haven't done anything with servers but the 474 cache update)

item.title: [PI] Server to Client error
